abstract.t: This document describes proposed conventions for use onIETF-related mailing lists. Subject to normal processes andprocedures, this draft might some day be published as an RFC withstatus of Best Current Practice (BCP). This document supplementsboth [RFC-2418] and [RFC-3005].Comments on this draft may be sent directly to the editor orto the <ietf-process@lists.elistx.com> mailing list. To subscribe tothat list, send an email request to ietf-process-request@lists.elistx.com
